84.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)

224.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)

21.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

180.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

134.movie_plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

108.movie_plot: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

124.movie_plot: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

146.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

54.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

281.movie_plot: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

101.movie_plot: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

159.movie_plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

32.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

205.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

182.movie_plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther, Bagheera, and free spirited bear, Baloo.

267.movie_plot: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

310.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

271.movie_plot: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

244.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

89.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

260.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

218.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

242.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

71.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

240.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

116.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

188.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

166.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

272.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.
